content: Just landed back in NYC. Japan's beauty and culture have inspired me. Dropping college for quant trading and tech. Excited but a bit nervous. A new chapter begins.
raw_content: 🗼✨ As I board my flight back to NYC from Tokyo, I carry with me not just souvenirs, but a newfound clarity. Japan's serene beauty and vibrant culture have ignited a spark within me. I've decided to dive headfirst into the world of quant trading and tech, leaving college behind for now. This journey has been a whirlwind of self-discovery, pushing me to embrace change and uncertainty. Excited for what lies ahead, but also a bit nervous about this leap into the unknown. #LifeChange #NewBeginnings #TravelInspired
